shortdesc.ph: Starts video preview and specifies the video source to preview.
Starts video preview and specifies the video source for preview.
Starts video preview and specifies the video source.
Starts video preview and specifies the video source.

section.p: This method starts the local video preview and specifies the video source to appear in the preview.
This method starts local video preview and specifies the video source to appear in the preview.
This method starts the local video preview and specifies the video source to appear in the preview.
This method starts the local video preview and specifies the video source to appear in the preview.

ul.li: Mirror mode is enabled by default for local preview.
After leaving the channel, the local preview remains active. You need to call to stop the local preview.
Local preview enables mirror mode by default.
After leaving the channel, the local preview remains active. You need to call to stop the local preview.
Local preview enables mirror mode by default.
After leaving the channel, local preview remains active. You need to call to stop the local preview.
Local preview enables mirror mode by default.
After leaving the channel, the local preview remains active. You need to call to stop the local preview.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
